description.displayText: I interviewed over the phone when Ambrosia today and even though I went with another nurse, she was very honest with working with the hours we had going on with my Mother. Very patient with me, as I was brain tired, and talking so much. I found her to be polite and kind and understanding.  Very sweet personality.

Very patient with me, as I was brain tired, and talking so much. I found her to be polite and kind and understanding.  Very sweet personality.

description.displayText: Ms. J. is a current caregiver/companion for my elderly aunt who has dementia.  Ambrosia is extremely patient with her while being firm and directive when needed.  She extends herself and truly places my aunt's needs first.  She began being my aunt's caregiver  in approximately late November while she was still living in her home.  One of the first examples of Ambrosia's caring nature was when she invited my aunt to go to her family's home for Christmas day as my aunt lives by herself and there are no relatives living in Georgia. After I gained guardianship, it became clear that I needed to move my aunt into an assisted living situation.  Ambrosia was instrumental in assisting me with a multitude of details and still continues to go to the senior facility on a regular basis.  She has been a lifesaver!!  She has certainly earned this high recommendation.

description.displayText: Ambrosia is a very dependable individual. She has been my mentor for the last couple of months.I am learning to become a caregiver,  anyhow ambrosia  took me under her wing and is teaching me everything  she knows. Since being around her I noticed both her companion  family's and babysitting family's  admire her and are instantly  attached. She spreads love  and passion with everything  she does I am so thankful for her help and I am excited for my experiences that are yet to come!
